text: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلْمَشْرِقِ وَٱلْمَغْرِبِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ ۖ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ

translation.en.sahih: [Moses] said, "Lord of the east and the west and that between them, if you were to reason."
translation.id.indonesian: Musa berkata: "Tuhan yang menguasai timur dan barat dan apa yang ada di antara keduanya: (Itulah Tuhanmu) jika kamu mempergunakan akal".
